item.title: Farmers Demand Justice: Massive Petition Submitted Over Seed Cotton Exploitation in Gadwal
item.description:
<![CDATA[Gadwal: A large group of seed cotton farmers, under the leadership of NHPS District Chairman Gongalla Ranjith Kumar, submitted a detailed petition to State Agriculture and Farmers Commission Chairman Kodanda Reddy, demanding urgent action against the ongoing exploitation by seed companies and their appointed organizers.
The representation was organized by Nadigadda Hakkula Porata Samithi (NHPS) and highlighted the systematic irregularities being faced by over 40,000 farmers cultivating more tha...]]>
item.author: M Veeresh
